ygData.subject: RE: WAaahooo!!
ygData.msgSnippet: That does suck, I d be pretty upset if I was accused of cheating because that s the mindset. Even sadder is that if they expect that 90 percent of us will
ygData.messageBody:
That does suck, I'd be pretty upset if I was accused of cheating because that's
the mindset.

Even sadder is that if they expect that 90 percent of us will damage the game or
other players if given a chance...they'd be too close to the mark for comfort.

I pine for the days of Beta (pre p4), where the vast majority of players were
just excited to be there, and each one was as clever and helpful as possible.

But on the plus side, I'm a Bard :)

Golias
